Text:
Let's hunt! Let's hunt! I'm sooo looking forward to
it!
Come on, Delta. We're not here to play, you know.

Okay, let's start by seizing the Herzog Family's
villa.

Gamma's taking care of the falsified paperwork, so
let's move forward with our plan to secure it as our
base.
Yes, ma'am!

If you try anything funny, I won't hesitate to take
you down from behind. Remember that as we go
into this operation, understood?
...You really don't trust me, do you?

Unfortunately, that's how it is for now. That's why
Lady Alpha mentioned the whole "oversee" thing.

Overseas...? That's where all the tasty exotic meat
at Mitsugoshi comes from!
Ah... No... Well, never mind...

Just carry out your duties diligently. We'll be
keeping an eye on you at all times.
Understood...!

While I still have reservations about her abilities,
I doubt No. 111 would betray the Shadow Garden
now. You can put those concerns to rest, Lambda.
Lady Epsilon...

If you're still unsure about your own path, I doubt
you'd jeopardize the current position you've worked
to achieve.

If you did, you'd likely lose all grasp of where you
stand now, wouldn't you?
I see, indeed... You're exactly right, Lady Epsilon.
...I'll guide you to the location.

There's a ferry to Laugus that departs from here
every half hour.
*sniff, sniff*
Delta?
...I smell prey.

Prey...?! Are there monsters?! But why would they be
at this portâ€”

Not that... It's that weird oily scent those Tempura
guys sometimes give off!
...Could it be that perfume the Templars use...?!

That alone isn't definitive proof. Regular civilians
also use that oil, after all.

Still, we'll have to be vigilant about the Templar's
activities here in the City States.

Their stronghold, the religious state Orum, is just a
stone's throw away from here.

I can't believe you're actually taking on both the
Cult of Diablos and the Templars... It's madness!

It might seem like madness to you, but it's our
reality.

The Templars are currently a key target for the
Shadow Garden to exterminateâ€”a more pressing
concern than even the Cult of Diablos.

Establishing a base in Laugus is crucial for us,
especially when engaging with the Templars.
That's the reason we're interested in your villa.

Impressive as always, Lady Epsilon. You've had the
Templars in mind from the start, haven't you?

Making a grand entrance right off the bat isn't a bad
idea, but let's tackle our top priorities first.

I don't really get it, but if we're gonna hunt,
let's hurry up and hunt now!

Have some patience, Delta! We'll need to seize the
villa first!

You're telling me to wait like Beta always does?!
You're weaker than me, so don't tell me to wait!

Strength aside, I'm the leader right now. And I have
a plan.
A plan?

Yes... Given that these islands serve as a transit
point between Velgalta and Midgar, they're likely
being used to transport the possessed.

If the possessed are being transported from the
Velgalta Empire to Midgar through these City
States...

Then the scent Delta picked up might indeed be the
Templars' perfume. They could be here to eliminate
the possessed... It's a plausible theory, isn't it?

So, we'll seize our base...potentially hunt down the
and Templar members, and rescue the possessed.

We'll tackle everything methodically and in the
proper sequence!
Sir! Yes sir!
Urrk, ummm...

Lady Epsilon wants to wait and observe for now...
Then swoop in and hunt them down once they've
all gathered.

Oh! So if I hold on just a bit longer, there'll be
even more prey? Guess I can wait a little until
then!

Thank you, Delta. Just be patient for a little
longer.

Now then, lead us to the villa, No. 111. Trust is
built upon results!
...Understood.
